reviews.name: Muruganandam Konnai
reviews.review: Friendly treatment, doctor fees and medicine rate is very low price. The hospital is very clean and hygienic. I had a skin disease and I was treated in many places including Thanjavur, Pondicherry and I was not cured. But after coming to this hospital I recovered completely within 20 days.

reviews.name: Harshitha Reddy
reviews.review: Dr Pradeepa is an amazing dermatologist and my skin issues just vanished. She analyses your skin in detail and recommends only the best and necessary medications. I would strongly recommend her for any skin or hair problems.

reviews.name: Al Basith
reviews.review: I took PRP treatment in this clinic. Doctor was very kind and excellent person. Doctor was very friendly with me. Clinic also very clean and hygiene. I was scared about the PRP treatment but doctor explained everything properly. Wonderful experience, thank you doctor.

reviews.name: Kumar J
reviews.review: Doctor explained thoroughly about the problem and its treatment. Though we asked for certain costly procedures, doctor said they were not needed. Shows great ethics and honesty.

reviews.name: Mohamed Naveeth
reviews.review: Doctor has very friendly good treatment and gives good results.

reviews.name: Vijaya Ragavan Kalathur
reviews.review: Very comfortable to see and consult here.
